comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boris_Sarafov Boris Petrov Sarafov (Bulgarian and Macedonian: Борис Петров Сарафов) (July 12, 1872, Nevrokop, Ottoman Empire, present-day Gotse Delchev, Bulgaria – November 28, 1907, Sofia) was a revolutionary from the region of Macedonia, one of the leaders of SMAC and VMORO. He is considered an ethnic Macedonian in the Republic of Macedonia and a Bulgarian in Bulgaria
